suite.name: MySql Tests

test.name: Insert a Record

kw.name: Connect
Connect To Database Using Custom Params
kw.msg: Keyword 'DatabaseLibrary.Connect To Database Using Custom Params' is deprecated. Use new `Connect To Database` keyword with custom parameters instead. The deprecated keyword will be removed in future versions.
Executing : Connect To Database Using Custom Params : pymysql.connect(db_api_2.connect(database='rftutorial', user='rftutorial', password=***, host='mysql1100.shared-servers.com', port=1091))
OperationalError: (2003, "Can't connect to MySQL server on 'mysql1100.shared-servers.com' ([Errno 11001] getaddrinfo failed)")
kw.doc: *DEPRECATED* Use new `Connect To Database` keyword with custom parameters instead. The deprecated keyword will be removed in future versions.
kw.status: OperationalError: (2003, "Can't connect to MySQL server on 'mysql1100.shared-servers.com' ([Errno 11001] getaddrinfo failed)")
OperationalError: (2003, "Can't connect to MySQL server on 'mysql1100.shared-servers.com' ([Errno 11001] getaddrinfo failed)")

kw.msg: No open database connection to close
